body.p:
Senate Chamber
2d Feb 1861
To His Excl.
B Magoffin
D Sir

Allow me to call your attention to the accompaning letter and petition. If of Course Know nothing of the facts I knew personally the petitioners they are highly repectable and orderly Citizens, and I therefore share a faverabl consideration of ther wishes.
